description:
Whether a champion or an amateur, all pool fans will find what they’re looking for in nPool. Whether it's 8ball, 9ball, or customizable tables – a champion will have what a champion needs.


A CLASSY CHALLENGE
nPool features single-player mode and friends mode, so you can choose to play versus AI or challenge your friends. With accurate rules, classy graphics, and transparent controls; winning is all you need to care about!


A FEAST FOR YOUR EYES AND YOUR SPIRIT
Customize the game’s background, pool table, and even the stick to make it a pleasurable experience for more than your competitive spirit.


KEY FEATURES:
- Play vs a friend or vs AI
- Two base game modes – 8ball and 9ball
- Multiple customizable options for the background, table, and stick
name: nPool
